testcase.name: Add products to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open And user done login...................................passed When user clicks on add to cart.............................................passed Then products add to the cart...............................................passed

testcase.name: Remove products from cart
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open And user done login...................................passed When user clicks on add to cart.............................................passed And user clicks on remove...................................................passed Then products remove from cart..............................................passed

testcase.name: Checking count of cart when prducts are added
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open And user done login...................................passed When user clicks on add to cart.............................................passed Then count of cart incresed.................................................passed

testcase.name: Checking count of cart when prducts are removed
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open And user done login...................................passed When user clicks on add to cart.............................................passed When user clicks on remove..................................................passed Then count of cart decreased................................................passed

testcase.name: Checking add to cart button
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open And user done login...................................passed When user clicks on add to cart.............................................passed Then user is on your cart page..............................................passed

testcase.name: Check login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed When user enters valid standard_user and secret_sauce.......................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Check login with valid credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed When user enters valid performance_glitch_user and secret_sauce.............passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Check login with valid credentials 3
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed When user enters valid problem_user and secret_sauce........................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Check login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed When user enters invalid roshani1 and roshani123............................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user get a message "invalid credentials"...............................passed

testcase.name: Verify cancel button
testcase.system-out: Given user done login And user is on overview page..........................passed When user click on cancel button............................................passed Then products page is displayed.............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify finish button
testcase.system-out: Given user done login And user is on overview page..........................passed When user click on finish button............................................passed Then checkout complete page is displayed....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify back home button
testcase.system-out: Given user done login And user is on overview page..........................passed When user click on back home button.........................................passed Then products page is displayed.............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify checkout
testcase.system-out: Given user done login And user is on your cart page.........................passed When user click on checkout.................................................passed Then your information page is displayed.....................................passed

testcase.name: product details are displayed
testcase.system-out: Given user done login And user is on your cart page.........................passed When user click on products.................................................passed Then product details page is display........................................passed

testcase.name: Remove product from cart
testcase.system-out: Given user done login And user is on your cart page.........................passed When user click on remove...................................................passed Then product remove from cart...............................................passed

testcase.name: Continue process with valid values
testcase.system-out: Given user done login And user is on your information page..................passed When user enters roshani and borase and 123456..............................passed And click on continue button................................................passed Then next page is displayed.................................................passed
